Paragraph.Text: Courtyard 1 is a room located at Hacienda del Mar . See below for more information about the complex. Courtyard 1 sleeps 2 people. It has a queen size bed, private bath, heat, AC, ceiling fan.
Courtyard 2 is a room located at Hacienda del Mar. See below for more information about the complex. Courtyard 2 sleeps 2 people. It has a queen size bed, private bath, heat, AC, ceiling fan.
La Chuparosa is a room located at Hacienda del Mar. See below for more information about the complex. La Chuparosa sleeps 2 people and is beautifully designed with boveda ceilings and gas fireplaces.
La Paloma is a room with located at Hacienda del Mar. La Paloma sleeps 2 people and is beautifully designed with boveda ceilings and fireplace. It has a queen size bed.
La Sala is a second-story studio, it has a queen size bed and sleeps 2 people. La Sala has a kitchenette and kitchen appliances including coffee maker, microwave, and refrigerator.
Pelicano is a one bedroom one bath guesthouse that sleeps up to 3. The bedroom has a queen size bed; the living room has a gas fireplace and queen futon. A rollaway is also available, full kitchen.
Las Mareas 21 is a two bedroom, one bath home that will accommodate 4 people. It is one lot from the beach. The master bedroom has a king bed and the second bedroom has two twins.
Nice two story fully furnished house with ocean view, & 30 yard walk to the beach. Home features include on the first floor, 2 bedrooms--one with a queen bed, the other with twins, and 1 bath.

Vistas de las Olas East is one of two suites available in this second row from the beach home with an absolutely beautiful view of the Sea of Cortez. It is located in Las Conchas. Vistas de las Olas East has a sister room, Vistas de las Olas West.
Vistas de las Olas West is one of two suites available in this second row from the beach home with an absolutely beautiful view of the Sea of Cortez.
La Gaviota is a beach front condo that has 2 bedrooms and 2 baths--the master bedroom has a queen bed and bath, and the other bedroom has twin beds.
Corona del Mar #202 is a second floor 2 bedroom, 2 bath condominium at Corona del Mar built in 2005, in the Las Conchas area of Rocky Point, and is just a short walk from the beach.
This guest house of a beachfront home has 2 bedrooms and 2 baths.--The master bedroom has a queen bed and bath; the other has twin beds.

Casa de D’Angelo is a BRAND NEW spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath Penthouse condominium at Corona del Sol # 204 just completed in 2008 in the LasConchas area of Rocky Point, this gem is just a short 2 minute walk to the beach.

Luna y Sol is a three bedroom, three bath condo--one bedroom is detached from the rest of the condo and has a king bed, private bath, heating and cooling. A second bedroom has a queen bed and private bath, and the third bedroom has twin beds. The kitchen
Mariposa is a two bedroom, two bath condo--the master bedroom has a queen bed and private bath. The other bedroom has twin beds.

Paradise Villas #19 is a two bedroom, two one half bath, two story town home--the master bedroom has a king bed, decorative fireplace, bath and terrace with ocean views. The other bedroom has a two full beds and bath and a TV Monitor with VCR.

Delfin Azul is a three bedroom, three bath condo with two master bedrooms, one of which is a separate suite with a full bed, private bath and private entry; the second master bedroom has a queen bed and private bath. The third bedroom has twin beds.

Delfin Verde is a three bedroom, three bath condo with two master bedrooms, one of which is a separate suite with a full bed, private bath and private entry; the second master bedroom has a queen bed and private bath. The third bedroom has twin beds.
The master bedroom has a queen size bed and private bath. The second bedroom has Two Twin size beds.

Casita de Sueños is a two bedroom, two bath condo--the master bedroom has a queen bed and bath. The other bedroom has a double bed. There is a fully equipped kitchen including a coffee maker, blender, toaster, and microwave. The living room has a queen si
Jungla Casita is a two bedroom, two bath condo, with additional sleeping for one or two more guests. The master bedroom suite has a double bed and private bath; the other bedroom has a double bed.
The master bedroom suite has a king size bed Satellite/TV and private bath. A large second bedroom has two full beds and is a short distance from the second bath.

Buenos Tiempos is a three bedroom,r three bath condo for up to six people. The master bedroom has a queen bed and private bath with double sinks. The second bedroom has a king bed, and the third bedroom, with private entrance, has a queen bed and private b

Casa de Juega is a three bedroom, three bath town home located in the Las Olas section of Las Conchas. The master bedroom suite has a king size bed and private bath with shower. The second bedroom has a full bed.

Aventura is a newly remodeled beach front condo that has 3 bedrooms and 3 baths--the master bedroom has a queen bed and bath, the second bedroom has two twin beds. The third bedroom has a queen bed, private entrance and private bath.

Paradise Villas #10 is a two and a half bedrooms, two one half bath, two story town home--the master bedroom has a queen bed, decorative fireplace, bath and terrace with ocean views. The other bedroom has a two full beds and bath.
Playa Romantica is a home on the beach that has 2 beachfront bedrooms and 2 baths. Both bedrooms have a queen bed and a twin with private patio access. There is a fully equipped kitchen.

Free wifi now installed! This beautiful newer luxury home sits directly across the street from the beach in prestigious Las Conchas, Rocky Point's most desirable family rental community. Las Conchas is the closest beach to all the shopping.
Los Tocayos is a full luxury home with great ocean views from master bedroom, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, washer and dryer, Garage , Flat screen satellite TV and more.

Dream by the sea is a beautiful 4-bedroom, 4-bath home with a wonderful view of the Sea of Cortez. It is one row back from the water with easy access to the beach. There are three master suites, and all four bedrooms boast boveda ceilings.

Casa De Carolina is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath beachfront home in Las Conchas with a spectacular view of the Sea of Cortez. Both bedrooms have an ocean view. The master on the east side has a queen bed with a memory foam mattress and a full bath with handicap

Brand New! HACIENDA ALAMOS is a Short walk to the beach; tastefully appointed with Hacienda decor; beautiful sunsets views. All accommodations have access to a common Living room/sitting area with satellite TV; large patio.

Unit.UnitHeadline: Casa Evita Beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bath on the beach.

Paragraph.Text: Casa Evita is a three bedroom,2 bath beach front house in Las Conchas with a spectacular views of the Sea of Cortez. Master bedroom,on west side facing the ocean,with Queen bed and private bath. The second bedroom has a queen and twin beds.

Finistera II is a single story three-bedroom two-bath beachfront home in Las Conchas with a beautiful view of the Sea of Cortez. The master bedroom has a queen bed, ocean view, patio access, wood burning fireplace (bring own wood or fire logs) and private

Marbrisa de Cortez is a brand new, gorgeously decorated, five bedroom, 4 ½ bath home, with beautiful views of the ocean. There are three master bedrooms. Master bedroom one has a king bed, access to an outside patio and large private bath.

Endless Summer/Eterno Verano is a four-bedroom three bath home one lot back from the ocean with easy access to the beach. The main floor consists of a master bedroom which has a queen bed, spacious sitting area, with a wet bar, Satellite TV and DVD.

Unit.UnitHeadline: 1400 Sq Feet inside with a 300 sq. ft. Deck overlooking the Sea of Cortez

Paragraph.Text: 2 Bedrooms – Master has king size bed 2nd Bedroom is a King or can be converted to two twins. • 2 Baths (Master has both tub & shower, 2nd bath has shower only) Beautiful Mexican Limestone • Full Kitchen with Granite Countertops and breakfast bar

Beachcomber is a large three bedroom, three bath home with many extras. The master suite faces the ocean and has private patio access, a king bed, decorative fireplace, and private bath with double sink, large shower with benches and two shower heads.

Casa Zillori is a two bedroom, two bath beachfront home in Las Conchas with a wonderful view of the Sea of Cortez. Both bedrooms are master suites, each with king size beds, an ocean view, and private bathrooms with showers.

Easy Street is a three bedroom, 2 bath house with the master bedroom suite, facing the ocean, and it has a king bed and private bath. The second bedroom also faces the ocean and has a king bed; the third bedroom has twin beds.
This beachfront home has three bedrooms, and two baths. The master suite has a king bed and private bath.
Casa de Paraiso is a brand new beautiful four bedroom, four bath home. Although this is a second row home, it has a front row like view of the Sea of Cortez, with beach access just steps away.

Casa Ciao is a two bedroom, two bathroom newly renovated beachfront home in section 9 of Las Conchas. Both bedrooms are master suites, each with queen size beds with memory foam toppers and down comforters,ocean view, private bathrooms with showers.

Each bedroom has a queen size memory foam mattress and down comforter. Each bedroom has it's own full size bathroom with shower. One bedroom is located at the front of the casita and has ocean views and the other is at the back of the home and has skylight

Cupula Azul is a beach front home with 4 bedrooms, 3 baths--the master bedroom has a king bed and full bath with double sink; two of the bedrooms have queen beds and the fourth bedroom has 4 bunk beds.

Bella Mareas is a newly built stunning beachfront home with remarkable views of the Sea of Cortez. It is located in the gated community of Las Conchas, in the subdivision Las Mareas. This single story luxurious beach house has all the amenities.

Las Palmeras is a lovely, spacious, airy beachfront home in Las Conchas. It has 5 bedrooms and 5 baths, and one of the bedrooms and bath is actually in a separate guest house with its own private entrance.
Hacienda del Mar is a six-unit hacienda style home, situated in the gated community of Las Conchas. Rooms can be rented individually or in any combination to accommodate groups up to 14 people.
Spectacular is the only way to describe this 4000 square foot, two story beach front home in the gated community of Las Conchas.

Unit.UnitName: Vistas de Las Olas Main House
Unit.UnitHeadline: Vistas de Las Olas Main House

Paragraph.Text: Vista de las Olas Main house is a beautiful large home situated on a cul de sac just one lot above the beach level with awesome views from the deck and upper deck, sunsets are spectacular!

La Sirena is a new luxury four bedroom, three-bath beachfront home located in Costa Diamante/Sandy Beach. The master beachfront suite has queen bed, private patio access, walk-in closet, large full bath with his and hers sinks.

Casa Playa is truly an extraordinary five bedroom beach home located in beautiful Las Conchas. Many outstanding amenities make this an unusually desirable vacation retreat. One enters through a Mexican style courtyard complete with palm trees.

Unit.UnitName: Vistas de Las Olas Entire Complex
Unit.UnitHeadline: Vistas de Las Olas Entire Complex

Paragraph.Text: Vistas de las Olas Entire complex consists of one main house and two suites available in this second row from the beach home with an absolutely beautiful view of the Sea of Cortez.

Casa Espiritu, located in Las Conchas, is a large beachfront complex that sleeps up to 16. The accommodations consist of a 4 bedroom, 5 bath spacious home; a 2 bedroom, 2 bath, self-contained guest quarters over the garage of the main house; and a separar
